entities.description: Different response categories for survey questions.
The raw count of respondents for each response category.
The percentage representation of each response category out of the total.
Data that was not recorded or is missing from the survey.
Units of measurement used in survey responses, such as Gram, Kilogram, Ounce, etc.
Count of responses for a particular category.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to different categories of responses.
Each response category has an associated unweighted frequency.
Each response category has an associated percentage out of the total.
The survey data includes missing data for certain responses.
Survey responses are recorded using specific units of measure.
The survey counts the frequency of responses for each category.
